error: nested array expressions are not allowed
  --> testdata/options/values/int64.proto:58:42
   |
58 |     i1: [1.5, "foo", true, inf, nan, {}, [], 0 to 1]
   |         --------------------------------------------
   |          |                               ^^
   |          |                               |
   |          ...within this array expression |
   |                                          |
   |                                          cannot nest this array expression...

   |                                              ^^^^^^
